org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers

Class GravesLSTM

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.Layer
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.BaseLayer
        • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.FeedForwardLayer
          • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.BaseRecurrentLayer
            • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.AbstractLSTM
              • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.GravesLSTM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, TrainingConfig
    Deprecated. 
    Will be eventually removed. Use LSTM instead, which has similar prediction accuracy, but supports CuDNN for faster network training on CUDA (Nvidia) GPUs

    @Deprecated
public class GravesLSTM
extends AbstractLSTM
    LSTM recurrent net, based on Graves: Supervised Sequence Labelling with Recurrent Neural Networks http://www.cs.toronto.edu/~graves/phd.pdf
    See Also:
    LSTM class, for the version without peephole connections, Serialized Form
